remarks: Implications for the value of an operation defined by the maps-to notation with a class abstration of words as a result having an element.  Note that ` ph ` may depend on ` z ` as well as on ` v ` and ` y ` .  (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 15-Jul-2018.)
statement:
elovmpt2wrd.o $e |- O = ( v e. _V , y e. _V |-> { z e. Word v | ph } ) $.
elovmpt2wrd $p |- ( Z e. ( V O Y ) -> ( V e. _V /\ Y e. _V /\ Z e. Word V ) ) $.
$d V v y z $.
$d Y v y z $.
$d Z z $.
